deadTorrents.approve: This torrent has been approved and will be ignored by me from now on.
deadTorrents.remove: I've removed the torrent and I'll attempt to fetch a new one.
deadTorrents.reset: I've reset the penalty score for this torrent.
deadTorrents.notexist:
This torrent no longer exists in the download client, interaction disregarded.
Running manual Transmission <==> Discord synchronisation.
